name: Falchionβ
desc:
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Activate 1 of these effects.
● Send 1 LIGHT Machine-Type monster with 1200 or less ATK from your Deck to your Graveyard.
● Target 1 LIGHT Machine-Type monster with 1200 or less ATK in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.
str2: Send 1 LIGHT Machine-Type monster with 1200 or less ATK from your Deck to your Graveyard.
str3: Special Summon 1 LIGHT Machine-Type monster with 1200 or less ATK from your Graveyard.
